entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 03:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Periods of ice pellets in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
